title: I was le bored, So I made le trailer

replies.body:
Nice trailer man :) 
The music and tempo really corresponds with the lighting and mood of the video, and you chose perfect texture packs :)
I made one of these as well, so i think i can safely say: GREAT TRAILER!

I sorta rushed it (Was finished within 1 hour)
Anyways, thanks! :D

replies.body: That was one of the best trailers I have ever seen! But just a question. How did you get the shot of the hub?
replies.body_tagged: That was one of the best trailers I have ever seen! But just a question. How did you get the shot of the hub?

replies.body:
Gaahh, those shaders and camera tilts. Too much for me.
Not to be harsh but I don't like the music, but I don't like most of AN's music in general >_<
Otherwise, great visuals and flow :)

EDIT: What's your video editor software? I probably won't be able to get it but it's obviously really awesome.
